description: Main Flutter application file for a Tic-Tac-Toe game. Contains the widget hierarchy, game logic, AI implementation, and layout for a responsive UI.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: The root widget that sets up theme and home page for the Tic Tac Toe application.

classes.name: TicTacToeHome
classes.description: Main StatefulWidget managing game state, UI, and interactions.

classes.name: _TicTacToeHomeState
classes.description: State class for TicTacToeHome handling game logic, user interactions, and UI updates.

classes.name: _StatusPill
classes.description: Custom widget displaying game status messages with icons and colors.

classes.name: _Board
classes.description: Widget rendering the 3x3 grid and handling tap interactions within the game.

classes.name: _GridPainter
classes.description: Custom painter for drawing grid lines on the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: _ActionButton
classes.description: Reusable button widget for game action buttons with visual styling.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for each widget: TicTacToeApp, TicTacToeHome, etc.

methods.name: restart
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: setMode
methods.description: Sets the game mode between PvP and AI.

methods.name: statusText
methods.description: Provides a user-friendly string representing current game status.

methods.name: onCellTap
methods.description: Handles user tapping a cell to make a move.

methods.name: _switchPlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player from X to O or vice versa.

methods.name: _evaluateBoard
methods.description: Checks the board for a winner or draw condition.

methods.name: _triggerAIMove
methods.description: Executes the AI's move after a brief delay, simulating thinking.

methods.name: _bestAIMove
methods.description: Simple AI logic: prioritize winning, blocking, center, corners, sides.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Determines if there's a winner based on current board state.
